title: Clean Burn - Supplement Reviews
author: Name
description: Clean Burn is a thermogenic weight-loss product made by Kaged Muscle. It was created to help speed up the metabolism and aid fat loss.
cleaned_text: About Clean Burn is a thermogenic weight-loss product made by Kaged Muscle. It was created to help speed up the metabolism and aid fat loss. The product contains five ingredients. Of these, L-carnitine tartrate (as Carnipure) is thought to improve focus and reduce fat mass, while the manufacturer says it includes green tea extract and cayenne pepper (as Capsimax®) to "stimulate thermogenesis", which could help burn fat faster. In addition, gymnema sylvestre extract could help "maintain healthy blood sugar levels", which may help prevent weight gain. Clean Burn has been third-party tested and is "certified free of banned substances". It also uses vegetable capsules and is certified halal.
